import{getLabelList}from"../../api";import{setSearchQuery}from"../content/message-list/actions/message-list.actions";export var GET_LABELS="GET_LABELS";export var SELECT_LABEL="SELECT_LABEL";export var getLabels=function getLabels(){return function(dispatch){getLabelList().then(function(labelList){dispatch({type:GET_LABELS,payload:labelList});});};};export var selectLabel=function selectLabel(labelId){return function(dispatch){//dispatch(setSearchQuery(""));
